job_desk: Developed a Back End using ExpressJS for an urgent AI Analytics project in under A Week.
Develop and maintain internal applications using Vue.js.
Developed integrations with Solar Panel providers to fetch solar panel status.
Integrating 3rd party payment providers to backend services (Midtrans, Faspay).
Worked closely with Quality Assurance to deliver high quality product.
Worked on Postgresql, mysql using Sequelize ORM
Worked on a non relational database such as MongoDB.
Integrating, logging and debugging Back End Services with Sentry
Integration with Firebase Cloud Messaging for push notifications.
Written a lot of unit test.
Helped generate 100+ ID Cards with Photo, Names, Title on a template for staff, guest starts etc. Using OpenCV, Pillow, MATPLOTLIB.
